<e:Skin class="TextInput_15_Skin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="blk_recordTitle" visible="false"></e:Image>
    <e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillAlpha="0" strokeAlpha="0" fillColor="0x000000"></e:Rect>
    <e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="13" right="13" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" size="60" promptColor="0x5b6690" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x15a7cb" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" height="60"></e:EditableText>
    <e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="13" right="13" textColor="0x7eedff" width="100%" height="32" size="27" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" verticalAlign="middle" text="" textAlign="center"></e:Label>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AnimationListSkin" width="2000" height="540" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:EUI="mo.EUI.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:COMM="G.COMM.*">

	<!--老虎機控制介面-->
	<e:Group id="grp_ui_slot" width="920" height="100" visible="false">
		<e:Group height="100%" left="0">
			<e:ToggleButton id="btn_newGame" label="${{blackgold_slot_game_new}}" verticalCenter="0" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6" x="0" y="27">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="dg_slot_btn" source.up="dg_slot_btn" source.down="dg_slot_btn_h"/>
					<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
					<EUI:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="122" y="34" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
					<e:layout>
						<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="30" paddingRight="30"/>
					</e:layout>
					</e:Group>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:ToggleButton>
			<e:ToggleButton id="btn_hotGame" label="${{blackgold_slot_game_hot}}" verticalCenter="0" left="160" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="dg_slot_btn" source.down="dg_slot_btn_h"/>
					<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
					<EUI:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="122" y="34" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
					<e:layout>
						<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="30" paddingRight="30"/>
					</e:layout>
					</e:Group>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:ToggleButton>
			<e:ToggleButton id="btn_allGame" label="${{blackgold_slot_game_all}}" verticalCenter="0" left="320" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="dg_slot_btn" source.down="dg_slot_btn_h"/>
					<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
					<EUI:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="122" y="34" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
					<e:layout>
						<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="30" paddingRight="30"/>
					</e:layout>
					</e:Group>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:ToggleButton>
			<e:ToggleButton id="btn_jp" label="${{blackgold_slot_game_jackpot}}" verticalCenter="0" left="480" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6" visible="false">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="dg_slot_btn" source.down="dg_slot_btn_h"/>
					<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
					<EUI:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="122" y="34" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
					<e:layout>
						<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="30" paddingRight="30"/>
					</e:layout>
					</e:Group>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:ToggleButton>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" gap="0"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="grp_search_bar" right="10" verticalCenter="0">
			 <e:Image verticalCenter="0" source="bg_slot_search" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="159"/>
			<e:TextInput id="label_input" left="30" width="120" height="30" skinName="TextInput_15_Skin" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Button id="btn_search" verticalCenter="0" scaleX="0.2" scaleY="0.2" left="10">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="dg_btn_search" source.down="dg_btn_search_h"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
		<EUI:Label id="labelNoGames" text="${{g_server_maintenance_title}}" width="920" horizontalCenter="0" y="300" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="48" includeInLayout="false" textAlign="center" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>

	<!--主要顯示scroller-->
	<e:Scroller id="roomList1" scrollPolicyH="off" width="920" height="540" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" bounces="false">
		<!--<e:viewport>-->
		<e:List id="list_room1" itemRendererSkinName="DiceRoomRendererSkin" anchorOffsetX="0" width="920" height="540">
            <e:layout>
                <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="2" horizontalGap="8" verticalGap="25"/>
            </e:layout>
        </e:List>
		<!--</e:viewport>-->
		<e:Skin>
            <COMM:VScrollBar2 id="verticalScrollBar" autoVisibility="false" height="100%" right="0">
                <e:Skin>
                    <e:Image id="grayArea" width="100%" height="100%" visible="false"/>
                    <e:Image id="thumb" source="s9g_v_scroll_bar_DG" right="-5" visible="false"/>
                </e:Skin>
            </COMM:VScrollBar2>
        </e:Skin>
	</e:Scroller>

	<!--界外顯示scroller-->
	<e:Scroller id="roomList2" x="1080" scrollPolicyH="off" width="920" height="540" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" bounces="false">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:List id="list_room2" itemRendererSkinName="DiceRoomRendererSkin" anchorOffsetX="0" width="920" height="540">
				<e:layout>
					<e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="2" horizontalGap="8" verticalGap="25"/>
				</e:layout>				
			</e:List>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>

	<!--頁籤控制介面-->
	<e:Group id="grp_ui_lobby" bottom="0" width="920" height="25" visible="false">
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<e:Skin class="VideoLoadingSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:EUI="mo.EUI.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loading">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{image}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{image0}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{image1}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{image2}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image source="blk_connectVideo"/>
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" y="20">
		<e:Image id="image" x="-6" y="-55" source="ico_pokerFlower_1"/>
		<e:Image id="image0" x="86" y="-55" source="ico_pokerFlower_2"/>
		<e:Image id="image1" x="166.5" y="-55" source="ico_pokerFlower_3"/>
		<e:Image id="image2" x="252" y="-38" source="ico_pokerFlower_4"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="60" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<EUI:Label text="${{g_video_loading}}" y="90" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true" size="60" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" wantWidth="800"/>
</e:Skin>

	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="pJump">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{label_pNum}">

<e:Skin class="TimerState2Skin" width="120" height="160" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:EUI="mo.EUI.*" states="betting, peek, lock, prebet" >
	
	<e:Group width="120" height="120">

		<!-- 鎖定 -->
		<e:Group id="groupLock" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="120" height="120" y="0" x="0" visible.lock="true" visible.betting="false" visible.peek="false" visible.prebet="false" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
			<e:Image source="timer_bg_lock" width="120" height="120"/>
		</e:Group>

		<!-- 請下注 -->
		<e:Group id="groupPlzBet" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="120" height="120" y="0" x="0" visible.prebet="true" visible.lock="false" visible.betting="false" visible.peek="false" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
			<!--<e:Image id="img_plz_bet" source="please_bet_6" width="120" height="120"/>-->
			<e:Image source="ico_bcr_timing" width="120" height="120" />
			<e:Image source="ico_bcr_takeBets" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-10"/>
			<EUI:Label text="${{g_bet_now}}" y="69" textColor="0x3BE000" size="36" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" style="txt_statetitle_green" height="50" horizontalCenter="0" horizontalCenter.prebet="0.5" y.prebet="73" maxSize="36" wantWidth="200"/>	
		</e:Group>

		<!-- 主播 -->
		<e:Group id="groupAnchor" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="120" height="120" y="0" x="0" visible.prebet="false" visible.lock="false" visible.betting="false" visible.peek="false" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
			<e:Image source="timer_bg_anchor" width="120" height="120"/>
		</e:Group>

		<!-- 倒數 -->
		<e:Group id="groupCountdown" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="120" height="120" y="0" x="0" visible.prebet="false" visible.lock="false" visible.betting="true" visible.peek="true" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
			<e:Image id="count_down_bg" source="timer_bg_green" width="120" height="120"/>
			<EUI:Label id="label_countDown" text="26" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x7ed321"  verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="84"/>
		</e:Group>

		<!-- 弧線 -->
		<e:Group id="groupArc" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible.lock="false" visible.prebet="false" visible.betting="true" visible.peek="true" width="120" height="120"/>
	
	</e:Group>

	<!-- 加時按鈕 -->

	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="openAni">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object y="{540}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="1000" ease="sineOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object y="{411}" x="{13}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="closeAni">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group}">

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BchtGameSkin" width="1280" height="769" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:EUI="mo.EUI.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:BASE="G.BASE.*" xmlns:BACC="G.BACC.*" xmlns:BCHT="G.BCHT.*" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="flash">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{btn_flashing}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.5}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="750">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="1000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.5}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="diceBottomBarPC35Skin" width="1280" height="769" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:DICE="G.DICE.*" xmlns:EUI="mo.EUI.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:BASE="G.BASE.*" xmlns:RLT="G.RLT.*" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" xmlns:COMM="G.COMM.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="flash">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{btn_flashing}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.5}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="750">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="1000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.5}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
    
	<e:Group id="grp_roomInfo" x="1047" y="64">
		<e:Rect width="222" height="200.67" y="27" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
		<COMM:TableInfo id="tableInfo" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" skinName="TableInfoSkin"/>

			<DICE:DiceHot id="hot_1" x="144" verticalCenter="-23"/>

				<tween:To duration="500">

					</tween:props>

				<tween:To duration="500">
